name: Armoryne
description: Armoryne is a resilient pokemon, able to withstand the intense heat and molten energy of its volcanic home. It is adorned in ornate armor that gives it a regal air, and allows it to bravely stand guard over its roost. Though seemingly inactive during the day, on a still night one can see it gathering its energy and releasing it in fierce fire storms, igniting the landscape with bursts of light and heat.
image_prompt: Armoryne::0 a fire-type pokemon::1.8, wearing ornate armor, in a volcano environment, lava texture background, anime sketch with watercolor --niji --ar 3:2
